name: Kezai
description: The Kezai is a Medium monstrosity characterized by its ability to inflict poison and fire damage. It has a toxic nature, creating a hazardous area around it with its Nauseous Gas, and is capable of flight.
memorable: Kezai combines flight with debilitating gas attacks, challenging players to maneuver carefully around it.
goals: To incapacitate enemies with poison and hinder their movement using gas attacks.
relations: Often found in the company of other poisonous creatures and beasts.
environment: Damp, dark locations where it can ambush foes with its gas attacks.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and high Dexterity make it a slippery opponent in combat.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence makes it ineffective in strategic planning.
attacks: Multiattack with claws and a poison barb, inflicting bludgeoning and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Searing Acid ability that can deal significant area fire damage while disabling its gas effect temporarily.
senses: The Kezai has blindsight within a range of 60 feet, allowing it to detect nearby creatures without sight.
additional_information: Area affected by Nauseous Gas is lightly obscured.
Poison barb can be used in both melee and ranged scenarios.
Claws deal consistent bludgeoning damage making it dangerous in close combat.
Requires Constitution saving throws to mitigate poison effects.
Has a tactical nature, creating gaseous hazards in combat.
